lines.text:
[First lines]
Dearest, sweet, thoughtful, understanding Jane, I know you won't believe this, sweetheart, but here goes anyway. You may recall, you and I were to be married a year ago last June. As I didn't turn up for the wedding, and so much time has gone by, I can imagine you have been wondering, ha ha, what happened.

[Using a home-made bamboo sextant]
According... to... my... calculations, I'm somewhere between Elmira, New York, and Muncie, Indiana.

[Last lines]
Anyway, dear, that's just the way it happened. I'll be home soon. All my love, Rob.

Survival at Sea and Like It. Chapter One, Down at Sea. All right, mister, let's take stock of the situation. The first thing we've got to remember is relax. Don't panic. Try to achieve a cheerful, constructive frame of mind at all times.
You know, she's a wonderful girl. She's going to make some head-hunter a great little wife someday.
